title: Number of nursery schools in the United Kingdom 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Number of schools has stayed the same over the Year.

Number of schools is roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2012/13, slightly decreasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, slightly increasing from 2013/14 to 2015/16, and finally roughly constant from 2015/16 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
The highest Number of schools, of value 3.1 was reached at Year 2011/12
Minimum Number of schools about 2.97 was reached at Year 2014/15
